name: Mouse Hunt (Mikhail Shubin)
description:
Little game about fox hunting mice under the snow. You need to find a mouse by listening to the sound it produces. 

This game requires listening to the sound, so headphones are recommended.

 Based on real events:

Controls:

[Arrow keys] to move and rotate camera.

[Space] to attempt to catch a mouse.

[R] to restart.

When mouse is found, level restarts automatically

Credits

Game by Mikhail Shubin. Dedicated to my wife.

Made in Python 3.7 with pyglet. Built with cx_Freeze.

source: https://gitlab.com/2pi360/mouse_hunt
